text:
We're back! Join us for a riveting conversation as we kickstart the second season of Blinkit Pitstop. For our first episode, Albinder Dhindsa, founder of Blinkit, welcomed Yushika Jolly and Siddharth Raguvanshi to talk about how to not just disrupt a category, but also create a whole new one. They've carved a niche for themselves with their semi-permanent hair colours that particularly resonate with millennials today.

Follow us on Instagram to stay updated
Blinkit:   / letsblinkit  
Paradyes: https://instagram.com/birdsofparadyes...

We welcomed Shankar Prasad of Plum Goodness for an episode of Blinkit Pitstop and learnt how goodness is central to their company, and how they're using it to fuel their goals and innovations in the beauty industry. Watch to learn what sets the skincare and makeup segments apart, what are the products that actually make skin better, how to hire great talent, and the values that drive Shankar and the company.
